data.name: Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns™ & Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire™ Expansions
data.detailed_description:
Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns is the first Guild Wars 2 expansion. The Elder Jungle Dragon Mordremoth is awake and spreading its toxic influence across central Tyria, corrupting minds and destroying lives. Explore the vast Heart of Maguuma across four new maps, take on the Mouth of Mordremoth in a massive open-world boss encounter, and team up with other skilled players to challenge three raids.

Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire is the second Guild Wars 2 expansion. The rogue god of war, Balthazar, is bent on destroying the Elder Dragons and restoring his divine power. If he succeeds, Tyria is doomed. Follow him to the Crystal Desert and explore five new maps, unlock nine elite specializations, and challenge your skills in three raids.



Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire introduces mounts that are far more than a speed boost—they're a whole new way to move through the world of Tyria. Unlock and train your new companions using the Mastery system, and explore freely by leaping across canyons, bounding up high cliffs, and skimming over water and quicksand.



Each expansion includes access to nine new elite specializations. With a variety of playstyles, weapon choices, and traits to choose from, there are more options than ever to help you customize your character.



*Players may need to relaunch the game for the upgrade to take effect.
**Please note that existing Guild Wars 2 player accounts cannot be accessed via Steam

data.short_description: Explore the Crystal Desert in the second, critically acclaimed Guild Wars 2 expansion. You’ll also unlock the first expansion, Guild Wars: Heart of Thorns.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 or better (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Quad 2.4 GHz, Core i3, AMD Athlon 64 X2 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800GTS, ATI Radeon HD 2900 XT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
